verses.text: God, \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H5921"\w* put \w us|strong="H5921"\w* away \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w*, \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H5921"\w* sent \w us|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* all directions, \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H5921"\w* been angry; O \w be|strong="H1732"\w* turned \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w* \w again|strong="H3925"\w*.

\w By|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* power \w of|strong="H1516"\w* \w your|strong="H7725"\w* hand \w the|strong="H0853"\w* earth is shaking \w and|strong="H7725"\w* broken; \w make|strong="H7725"\w* \w it|strong="H7725"\w* strong \w again|strong="H7725"\w*, \w for|strong="H0854"\w* \w it|strong="H7725"\w* is moved.

\w You|strong="H7725"\w* \w have|strong="H0430"\w* \w made|strong="H6555"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* people see hard times; \w you|strong="H7725"\w* \w have|strong="H0430"\w* given \w us|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* wine \w of|strong="H0430"\w* shaking \w for|strong="H0430"\w* \w our|strong="H0430"\w* drink.

Give \w a|strong="H3588"\w* safe \w place|strong="H0776"\w* \w to|strong="H0776"\w* \w those|strong="H3588"\w* \w who|strong="H0776"\w* \w have|strong="H0776"\w* fear \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, where \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w may|strong="H0776"\w* go \w in|strong="H0776"\w* flight \w from|strong="H0776"\w* before \w the|strong="H3588"\w* bow. (Selah.)

\w So|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w your|strong="H7200"\w* loved ones \w may|strong="H3196"\w* be \w made|strong="H8248"\w* safe, let \w your|strong="H7200"\w* right hand be \w my|strong="H7200"\w* salvation, \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w give|strong="H8248"\w* \w me|strong="H7200"\w* \w an|strong="H7200"\w* answer.

\w God|strong="H5414"\w* \w has|strong="H5414"\w* said \w in|strong="H5414"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* holy \w place|strong="H5414"\w*, \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H5414"\w* \w be|strong="H5414"\w* glad: \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H5414"\w* \w make|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H5414"\w* division \w of|strong="H6440"\w* Shechem, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* valley \w of|strong="H6440"\w* Succoth \w will|strong="H5414"\w* \w be|strong="H5414"\w* measured \w out|strong="H6440"\w*.

Gilead \w is|strong="H3225"\w* mine, \w and|strong="H6032"\w* Manasseh \w is|strong="H3225"\w* mine; \w and|strong="H6032"\w* Ephraim \w is|strong="H3225"\w* \w the|strong="H3467"\w* strength \w of|strong="H4616"\w* \w my|strong="H3467"\w* head; Judah \w is|strong="H3225"\w* \w my|strong="H3467"\w* law-giver;

Moab \w is|strong="H0430"\w* \w my|strong="H1696"\w* washpot; over Edom \w will|strong="H0430"\w* I put out \w my|strong="H1696"\w* shoe; over Philistia \w will|strong="H0430"\w* \w a|strong="H1696"\w* glad cry \w be|strong="H0430"\w* sounded.

\w Who|strong="H3063"\w* \w will|strong="H3063"\w* take me \w into|strong="H3063"\w* \w the|strong="H4519"\w* \w strong|strong="H4581"\w* town? \w who|strong="H3063"\w* \w will|strong="H3063"\w* be \w my|strong="H0669"\w* guide \w into|strong="H3063"\w* Edom?

\w Have|strong="H5921"\w* not \w you|strong="H5921"\w* put \w us|strong="H5921"\w* \w away|strong="H7993"\w*, O God? \w and|strong="H4124"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H5921"\w* not gone \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w our|strong="H5921"\w* armies.
Give us help \w in|strong="H5704"\w* our trouble; \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w there|strong="H5704"\w* \w is|strong="H4310"\w* \w no|strong="H4310"\w* help \w in|strong="H5704"\w* man.

\w Through|strong="H3318"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* we \w will|strong="H0430"\w* \w do|strong="H3318"\w* \w great|strong="H0430"\w* \w things|strong="H3808"\w*, \w for|strong="H6635"\w* \w through|strong="H3318"\w* \w him|strong="H3318"\w* \w our|strong="H0430"\w* haters \w will|strong="H0430"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* crushed under \w our|strong="H0430"\w* feet.
